categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Newland was a human male in the Galactic Empire. During the Galactic Civil War, he held the rank of major and served at the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, where he served in an All Terrain Scout Transport with Lieutenant Blanaid.

During the Battle of Endor, the Wookiee Chewbacca and two Ewoks landed on top of Newland and Blanaid's Scout Transport, with one of the Ewoks appearing before the AT-ST's viewports and teasing the walker drivers within. Upon spotting the assailant, Newland immediately ordered Blanaid to remove the Ewok from their walker. However, when Blanaid peered out of the walker cockpit's top hatch, the lieutenant was pulled out and thrown overboard by the Wookiee Chewbacca. This allowed the Wookiee's Ewok companions to drop into the walker cockpit and beat Newland unconscious to take control of the Imperial machine.

Later in the battle, Han Solo donned Newland's uniform and helmet in a guise to trick the commander of the Death Star's shield generator, Major Hewex into opening the bunker's doors, allowing the Rebels access to the control room.

Newland was played by the director of Return of the Jedi, Richard Marquand. In the Legends continuity, the character was named Marquand after him, but his name was changed to Newland in the new Star Wars canon.
